title: Leagues Reward Shop

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Leagues Reward Shop is a store run by the League Tutor in Catherby, near the bank. They sell rewards from Old School RuneScape Leagues in exchange for points earned within the Leagues on members' worlds.

content:
Leagues Reward Shop
Released14 November 2019 (Update)
MembersYes
Minimap icon
LocationCatherby
OwnerLeague Tutor
SpecialtyLeagues rewards
Location

The Leagues Reward Shop is a store run by the League Tutor in Catherby, near the bank. They sell rewards from Old School RuneScape Leagues in exchange for points earned within the Leagues on members' worlds.

Contents

  • 1 Stock
    • 1.1 Twisted League rewards
    • 1.2 Trailblazer League rewards
    • 1.3 Shattered Relics League rewards
  • 2 Extra point calculations
    • 2.1 Twisted League rewards
    • 2.2 Trailblazer League rewards
    • 2.3 Shattered Relics League rewards
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 References

Extra point calculations[edit | edit source]

Twisted League rewards[edit | edit source]

The t3 armour set includes a Twisted cane. Their value individually is as follows.

ItemPrice
sold at		GE
price		GP per point
Twisted Relic Hunter (T3)
(without a Twisted cane)		 10,000 2,344,135234.41
Twisted caneFree 393,17139.32

Though buying a Twisted relic hunter armour set gives individual pieces, these can be made into box sets. This does not account the inclusion of a Twisted cane in t3 armour set rewards.

ItemPrice
sold at		GE
price		GP per point
Twisted Relic Hunter (T1) 1,000 425,448425.45
Twisted Relic Hunter (T2) 2,500 499,148199.66
Twisted Relic Hunter (T3) 10,000 3,249,926324.99

Trailblazer League rewards[edit | edit source]

The t3 armour set includes a Trailblazer cane. Their value individually is as follows.

ItemPrice
sold at		GE
price		GP per point
Trailblazer Relic Hunter (T3)
(without a Trailblazer cane)		 15,000 3,170,785211.39
Trailblazer caneFree 352,93623.53

Though buying a Trailblazer relic hunter armour set gives individual pieces, these can be made into box sets. This does not account the inclusion of a Trailblazer cane in t3 armour set rewards.

ItemPrice
sold at		GE
price		GP per point
Trailblazer Relic Hunter (T1) 1,000 355,105355.11
Trailblazer Relic Hunter (T2) 3,000 862,622287.54
Trailblazer Relic Hunter (T3) 15,000 3,052,919203.53

Shattered Relics League rewards[edit | edit source]

The t3 armour set includes a Shattered cane. Their value individually is as follows.

ItemPrice
sold at		GE
price
Shattered Relic Hunter (T3)
(without a Shattered cane)		 15,000 1,008,304
Shattered caneFree 157,333

Though buying a Shattered relic hunter armour set gives individual pieces, these can be made into box sets. This does not account the inclusion of a Shattered cane in t3 armour set rewards.

ItemPrice
sold at		GE
price
Shattered Relic Hunter (T1) 1,000 552,352
Shattered Relic Hunter (T2) 3,000 1,047,474
Shattered Relic Hunter (T3) 15,000 7,057,023

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
13 January 2021
(update)

Players now need a Bank PIN to access the Leagues Reward Shop.

6 January 2021
(update)

Players are able to unlock Trailblazer rewards from the Leagues Reward Shop.

15 December 2020
 Hotfix

The Leagues rewards shop was reopened.[1]

20 November 2020

Trailblazer Relic Hunter (T3) cost increased from 10,000 to 15,000 League Points.[2]

28 October 2020
 Hotfix

The League Reward Shop was temporarily disabled.[3]

28 October 2020
(update)

Stock for Trailblazer League rewards was added.

Date unknown

The shop was renamed from League Reward Shop to Leagues Reward Shop.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. OldSchoolRS's Twitter account. 15 December 2020. (Archived from the original on 25 December 2020.) OldSchoolRS: " The Leagues rewards shop is now open! Twisted League items can be purchased now! Trailblazer rewards will be available once the League ends If you haven't played since December 9th, make sure to login & claim your FREE 250 points by opening the Leagues Task Interface."
  2. ^ Jagex. JagexHusky's Twitter account. 20 November 2020. (Archived from the original on 21 November 2020.) JagexHusky: "Since I'm going on holiday next week I'm in a rather good mood so here's the Trailblazer reward shop costs! These will be purchasable after the league ends. Note: Ornament kit - 1,500 for 1 kit Graceful Dye - 6,000 for 6 kits"
  3. ^ Jagex. OldSchoolRS's Twitter account. 28 October 2020. (Archived from the original on 21 November 2020.) OldSchoolRS: "We've temporarily disabled the Leagues Reward Shop whilst we investigate possible issues."
